translations.en: ğŸ You hardly walk in the snow while listening to the gentle rustle that it produces under your steps. While snowing, you look away at the beautiful sunset. Suddenly, you feel the vacuum under your feet and you fall from a small snowlift. The snow dampening your fall, you land in front of a huge Cathedral. The soothing light illuminating the stained glass, as well as the solid wooden doors framed by large candles, invite you to pass the threshold of this sacred and warm place. As you enter, you discover that the inside is surrounded by numerous hollows and ivy leavesâ€™ crowns. Christmas songs escape from faithful believers and resonate on the old stones walls. Your heart swings between resuming your road or joining this atmosphere that reminds you of your childhood.

Vous sortez du sanctuaire et rencontrez une vieille dame, habillÃ©e de rouge et de blanc. On dirait mÃªme qu'elle a une lÃ©gÃ¨re barbe blanche ! MÃ¨re NoÃ«l a eu vent de toutes les bonnes actions que vous avez rÃ©alisÃ©es lors de cette annÃ©e presque achevÃ©e. Elle vous tend un petit coffret enrubannÃ© de soie verte et rouge tout en vous souhaitant un Joyeux NoÃ«l ! TouchÃ© par cette attention, vous prenez le temps de la remercier, puis ouvrez lentement le coffret et y dÃ©couvrez un petit mot dont le texte vous rÃ©chauffe le cÅ“ur. translations.en: You quietly pray in front of the altar about your adventureâ€™s success, your destined glory and the fact that your name is inscribed in History. You leave the sanctuary and meet an old lady, dressed in red and white. It looks like she has a faint white beard! Mrs Santa heard about all the good deeds you performed during this almost finished year. She gives you a small box wrapped in green and red silk while wishing you a Merry Christmas! Touched by this attention, you take the time to thank her, then slowly open the box and discover a little word whose warms you to the heart. You decide to continue your journey after this joyful encounter.

Vous le remerciez chaleureusement et en buvez le contenu Ã©carlate. Vous relevez la tÃªte, le vieillard s'est volatilisÃ©. C'Ã©tait le Grand Nikyulas en personne ! Vous retrouvez toute votre Ã©nergie grÃ¢ce Ã  cet Ã©tonnant breuvage et dÃ©cidez de poursuivre votre aventure !
translations.en: You take the time to pray for all beings in this kingdom, then exit the catheteral. As snow swirls around you, you see a glow in the distance: an old bishop moves on the path, lantern by hand. When he sees you arrive, a big smile illuminates his face: he wishes you a Merry Christmas while giving you a little flask. You thank him warmly and then drink the scarlet content. By raising the head, the old man had vanished. It was Great Nikyulas in person! You regain all your energy thanks to this amazing beverage and decide to continue your adventure!

Vous vous relevez et reprenez lentement votre pÃ©riple dans la neige glaciale jusqu'Ã  ce que votre pied bute sur quelque chose. Vous enlevez la neige qui recouvre cet obstacle et dÃ©couvrez une boite en bois, peinte de rouge et de vert, dÃ©corÃ©e avec ce qui semble Ãªtre des bonhommes de pain d'Ã©pice. Vous la soulevez pour l'examiner sous toutes ses coutures et l'ouvrez pour en sortir l'objet Ã  l'intÃ©rieur. Votre regard s'illumine. Enfin !
translations.en: You take place and start praying hoping youâ€™ll get the equipment you need for your quest, perhaps permitting you to propose the Princess. You get up and slowly pick up your journey in the icy snow until your foot stumbles over something. You remove the snow covering this obstacle and discover a wooden box painted in red and green, with what seems to be a gingerbread man. You grab it to examine it and open it to take the object thatâ€™s inside. Your eyes brightened. Finally!

translations.fr: Vous priez pour un futur harmonieux et paisible, pour que vos pas vous guident avec assurance mÃªme dans les chemins les plus sombres. Vous sortez de la cathÃ©drale et rejoignez un petit chemin tracÃ© dans la neige. Des tintements et des renÃ¢clements attirent votre attention. Vous tournez la tÃªte et apercevez derriÃ¨re vous, neuf rennes filant Ã  toute allure dans votre direction...  Ils se dÃ©placent tellement vite que vous avez seulement le temps d'apercevoir le nez rouge du premier. C'est un traÃ®neau conduit par deux personnes Ã¢gÃ©es vÃªtus de tenues rouges et blanches ainsi que de deux petits nains affublÃ©s d'habits verts. ImmÃ©diatement, vous vous ruez Ã  leur poursuite ! MalgrÃ© votre impressionnante vitesse, ils vous distancent rapidement.
translations.en: You pray for a harmonious and peaceful future, that your steps will guide you confidently even in the darkest paths. You get out of the Cathedral and join a small path traced through the snow. Many tints accompanied by a bulge attract your attention. You turn your head and see behind you nine reindeers rushing in your direction...  They move so fast that you only have time to see the red nose of the first one. It is a snow trolley driven by two red and white outfitted people, as well as two small dwarves with green clothes. Immediately, you are rushing to follow them! Despite your incredible speed, they quickly outrun you.

Vous vous endormez dans le foin auprÃ¨s d'un bÅ“uf et d'un mouton, sans mÃªme vous en rendre compte, et rÃªvez que vous volez au-dessus des arbres. Ã€ votre rÃ©veil, vous trouvez une fiole d'hydromel et une bourse fermÃ©e par une laniÃ¨re en cuir sur laquelle vous pouvez lire : Â« Joyeux NoÃ«l ! Â». Vous repartez heureux en bÃ©nissant le saint homme Ã  l'origine de cela.
translations.en: You decide to go to to the barn next to the cathedral and admire the landscape around you. You fall asleep in the hay of a beef and a sheep, without noticing it, and dream you fly over the trees. When you wake up, you find a flask of hydromel and a purse closed by a strap on which you can read : "Merry Christmas!". You leave happy by blessing the holy man at the origin of this.

translations.fr: ğŸ Vous poursuivez votre chemin et tombez nez-Ã -nez avec un troupeau de moutons, Ã©chappÃ©s de la grange attenante Ã  la cathÃ©drale. Vous effleurez de minuscules objets qui vous semblent mÃ©talliques. Ce sont des piÃ¨ces d'or ! Vous prenez soin de toutes les rÃ©cupÃ©rer.
translations.en: ğŸ You continue your path and come face to face with a herd of sheep, escaped from the barn adjoining the cathedral. You pass your hands in the soft coat of a two-colored sheep to heat them. After a few moments, a soothing heat grabs your hands and recovers to your heart. You touch a tiny object that looks metallic. These are gold pieces! You take care of getting them all.
